scripts.scc:report: scc src --sort names --no-cocomo --exclude-dir interfaces --by-file --format wide > scc-report.txt
scripts.coverage:report: forge coverage --fork-url $(grep HOLESKY_RPC .env | cut -d '=' -f2,3,4,5) --fork-block-number 2160000 --report lcov && genhtml lcov.info -o report --branch-coverage && rm lcov.info
